entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
